text:
[Verse]
Night so clear no clouds in sight
We can dance until the light
Stars above a sweet delight
Feel the rhythm feel the night

[Verse 2]
Barefoot on the grassy floor
Music flowing more and more
Heartbeats racing hear them roar
Find the magic we adore

[Chorus]
Dancing in the moonlight
Shadows playing just right
Every move feels so bright
Together take flight

[Verse 3]
Whispers float on evening breeze
Time stands still in moments like these
Joyful laughter moving with ease
Hearts are soaring skies of peace

[Bridge]
Close your eyes let it in
Feel the joy let it spin
Under stars we'll begin
Dance away all our sin

[Chorus]
Dancing in the moonlight
Shadows playing just right
Every move feels so bright
Together take flight
title: Dancing in the Moonlight
